EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_PCF Users Group Cocktail Reception_Switzerland_Q418.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: PCF User Group Cocktail Reception | Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow for the PCF User Group Cocktail Reception, hosted by Pivotal at Swiss Hotel Helvetia Foyer 2. As a reminder, this will be a a unique opportunity for you to network with your peers and give Pivotal feedback on what is working and what is not working. We'll take care of breakfast and hors d'oeuvres.
Date: 9, October, 2018
Time: 6:00PM to 8:00PM
Location: Swiss Hotel Helvetia Foyer 2 Basel (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps?q=Swissotel+Le+Plaza+Basel,+Messeplatz+25+4005+Basel&z=13]]>)
If you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please contact us at mschlegel@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mschlegel@pivotal.io]]>. We look forward to seeing you there.
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[]]>
